topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cc5a376368725f34570100#post_53cc5a376368725f34570100

its awfully long so you have to be THERE for like full 2 hours.

the community is toxic AS FUCK, they take the game way to seriously so if you screw up they instantly lump into you, and since the game is complicated it can take a long while to know how to play, but nobody likes noobs so it isnt noob friendly at all.

plus it seems repetitive as fuck.

its bad as in boring or badly programmed, its bad in the sense that the game has a "No fun allowed" sticker plastered on it.
